verses.verse: Then <WG5119> spake<WG2980> Jesus<WG2424> to the multitudes<WG3793> and<WG2532> to<WG3101> his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>,
saying <WG3004>, The scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> the Pharisees<WG5330> sit<WG2523> on<WG1909> Moses<WG3475> seat<WG2515>:

all <WG3956> things therefore<WG3767> whatsoever<WG3745> they bid<WG2036> you<WG5213>, these<WG5083> do<WG4160> and<WG2532> observe<WG5083>: but<WG1161> do<WG4160> not<WG3361> ye<WG4160> after<WG2596> their<WG846> works<WG2041>; for<WG1063> they say<WG3004>, and<WG2532> do<WG4160> not<WG3756>.

Yea <WG1063>, they bind<WG1195> heavy<WG926> burdens<WG5413> and<WG2532> grievous to be borne<WG1419>, and<WG2532> lay<WG2007> them on<WG1909> men<WG444>'s shoulders<WG5606>; but<WG1161> they themselves will<WG2309> not<WG3756> move<WG2795> them<WG846> with<WG1147> their<WG846> finger<WG1147>.

But <WG1161> all<WG3956> their<WG846> works<WG2041> they do<WG4160> to<WG4314> be seen<WG2300> of men<WG444>: for they make broad<WG4115> their<WG846> phylacteries<WG5440>, and<WG2532> enlarge<WG3170> the borders<WG2899> of<WG2440> their<WG846> garments<WG2440>,
and <WG5037> love<WG5368> the chief place<WG4411> at<WG1722> feasts<WG1173>, and<WG2532> the chief seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the synagogues<WG4864>,
and <WG2532> the salutations<WG783> in<WG1722> the marketplaces<WG58>, and<WG2532> to be called<WG2564> of<WG5259> men<WG444>, Rabbi<WG4461>.

But <WG1161> be<WG2564> not<WG3361> ye<WG5210> called<WG2564> Rabbi<WG4461>: for<WG1063> one<WG1520> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> teacher<WG2519>, and<WG1161> all<WG3956> ye<WG5210> are<WG2075> brethren<WG80>.

And <WG2532> call<WG2564> no<WG3361> man your<WG5216> father<WG3962> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>: for<WG1063> one<WG1520> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962>, even he who is<WG3588> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.
Neither <WG3366> be ye called<WG2564> masters<WG2519>: for<WG1063> one<WG1520> is<WG2076> your<WG5216> master<WG2519>, even the Christ<WG5547>.
But <WG1161> he that is greatest<WG3187> among you<WG5216> shall be<WG2071> your<WG5216> servant<WG1249>.
And <WG1161> whosoever<WG3748> shall exalt<WG5312> himself<WG1438> shall be humbled<WG5013>; and<WG2532> whosoever shall<WG3748> humble<WG5013> himself<WG1438> shall be exalted<WG5312>.

But woe<WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, hypocrites<WG5273>! because<WG3754> ye shut<WG2808> the kingdom<WG932> of heaven<WG3772> against<WG1715> men<WG444>: for<WG1063> ye<WG5210> enter not<WG3756> in<WG1525> yourselves<WG3756>, neither suffer ye<WG5210> them that are entering<WG1525> in to enter<WG1525>.

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, hypocrites<WG5273>! for<WG3754> ye compass<WG4013> sea<WG2281> and<WG2532> land<WG3584> to make<WG4160> one<WG1520> proselyte<WG4339>; and<WG2532> when<WG3752> he is become<WG1096> so<WG4160>, ye make him<WG846> twofold more<WG1362> a son<WG5207> of hell<WG1067> than yourselves<WG5216>.

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, ye blind<WG5185> guides<WG3595>, that say<WG3004>, Whosoever<WG3739> shall swear<WG3660> by<WG1722> the temple<WG3485>, it is<WG2076> nothing<WG3762>; but<WG1161> whosoever<WG3739> shall swear<WG3660> by<WG1722> the gold<WG5557> of the temple<WG3485>, he is a debtor<WG3784>.
Ye fools<WG3474> and<WG2532> blind<WG5185>: for<WG1063> which<WG5101> is<WG2076> greater<WG3187>, the gold<WG5557>, or<WG2228> the temple<WG3485> that hath sanctified<WG37> the gold<WG5557>?

And <WG3739>, Whosoever<WG1437> shall swear<WG3660> by<WG1722> the altar<WG2379>, it is<WG2076> nothing<WG3762>; but<WG1161> whosoever<WG302> shall swear<WG3660> by<WG1722> the gift<WG1435> that is upon<WG1883> it<WG846>, he is a debtor<WG3784>.
Ye blind<WG5185>: for<WG1063> which<WG5101> is greater<WG3173>, the gift<WG1435>, or<WG2228> the altar<WG2379> that sanctifieth<WG37> the gift<WG1435>?
He <WG3660> therefore<WG3767> that sweareth<WG3660> by<WG1722> the altar<WG2379>, sweareth<WG3660> by<WG1722> it<WG846>, and<WG2532> by<WG1722> all things<WG3956> thereon<WG846>.
And <WG2532> he that sweareth<WG3660> by<WG1722> the temple<WG3485>, sweareth<WG3660> by<WG1722> it<WG846>, and<WG2532> by<WG1722> him that dwelleth<WG2730> therein<WG846>.
And <WG2532> he that sweareth<WG3660> by<WG1722> the heaven<WG3772>, sweareth<WG3660> by<WG1722> the throne<WG2362> of God<WG2316>, and<WG2532> by<WG1722> him that sitteth<WG2521> thereon<WG846>.

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, hypocrites<WG5273>! for<WG3754> ye tithe<WG586> mint<WG2238> and<WG2532> anise<WG432> and<WG2532> cummin<WG2951>, and<WG2532> have left undone<WG863> the weightier<WG926> matters of the law<WG3551>, justice<WG2532>, and mercy<WG1656>, and<WG2532> faith<WG4102>: but these<WG5023> ye<WG1163> ought to have done<WG4160>, and<WG2548> not<WG3361> to have left<WG863> the other<WG2548> undone<WG863>.
Ye blind<WG5185> guides<WG3595>, that strain out<WG1368> the gnat<WG2971>, and<WG1161> swallow<WG2666> the camel<WG2574>!

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, hypocrites<WG5273>! for<WG3754> ye cleanse<WG2511> the outside<WG1855> of the cup<WG4221> and<WG2532> of the platter<WG3953>, but<WG1161> within<WG2081> they are full<WG1073> from<WG1537> extortion<WG724> and<WG2532> excess<WG192>.

Thou blind<WG5185> Pharisee<WG5330>, cleanse<WG2511> first<WG4412> the inside<WG1787> of the cup<WG4221> and<WG2532> of the platter<WG3953>, that<WG2443> the outside<WG1622> thereof<WG846> may become<WG1096> clean<WG2513> also<WG2532>.

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, hypocrites<WG5273>! for<WG3754> ye are like unto<WG3945> whited<WG2867> sepulchres<WG5028>, which<WG3748> outwardly<WG1855> appear<WG5316> beautiful<WG5611>, but<WG1161> inwardly<WG2081> are<WG1073> full<WG1073> of<WG3747> dead<WG3498> men<WG3747>'s bones, and<WG2532> of<WG3747> all<WG3956> uncleanness<WG167>.

Even so<WG3779> ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> outwardly<WG1855> appear<WG5316> righteous<WG1342> unto men<WG444>, but<WG1161> inwardly<WG2081> ye are<WG2075> full<WG3324> of hypocrisy<WG5272> and<WG2532> iniquity<WG458>.

Woe <WG3759> unto you<WG5213>, scribes<WG1122> and<WG2532> Pharisees<WG5330>, hypocrites<WG5273>! for<WG3754> ye build<WG3618> the sepulchres<WG5028> of the prophets<WG4396>, and<WG2532> garnish<WG2885> the tombs<WG3419> of the righteous<WG1342>,

and <WG2532> say<WG3004>, If<WG1487> we had been<WG1510> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of<WG3962> our<WG2257> fathers<WG3962>, we<WG302> should<WG1510> not<WG3756> have been<WG1510> partakers<WG2844> with them<WG846> in<WG1722> the blood<WG129> of the prophets<WG4396>.
Wherefore <WG5620> ye witness<WG3140> to yourselves<WG1438>, that<WG3754> ye are<WG2075> sons<WG5207> of them that slew<WG5407> the prophets<WG4396>.
Fill <WG4137> ye<WG5210> up<WG4137> then<WG2532> the measure<WG3358> of<WG3962> your<WG5216> fathers<WG3962>.
Ye serpents<WG3789>, ye offspring<WG1081> of vipers<WG2191>, how shall<WG4459> ye escape<WG5343> the<WG575> judgment<WG2920> of hell<WG1067>?

Therefore <WG5124>, behold<WG2400>, I<WG1473> send<WG649> unto<WG4314> you<WG5209> prophets<WG4396>, and<WG2532> wise men<WG4680>, and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122>: some of<WG1537> them<WG846> shall ye kill<WG615> and<WG2532> crucify<WG4717>; and<WG2532> some of<WG1537> them<WG846> shall ye scourge<WG3146> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> synagogues<WG4864>, and<WG2532> persecute<WG1377> from<WG575> city<WG4172> to<WG1519> city<WG4172>:

that <WG3704> upon<WG1909> you<WG5209> may come<WG2064> all<WG3956> the righteous<WG1342> blood<WG129> shed<WG1632> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093>, from<WG575> the blood<WG129> of Abel<WG6> the righteous<WG1342> unto<WG2193> the blood<WG129> of Zachariah<WG2197> son<WG5207> of Barachiah<WG914>, whom<WG3739> ye slew<WG5407> between<WG3342> the sanctuary<WG3485> and<WG2532> the altar<WG2379>.
Verily <WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, All<WG3956> these things<WG5023> shall come<WG2240> upon<WG1909> this<WG3778> generation<WG1074>.

O Jerusalem<WG2419>, Jerusalem<WG2419>, that killeth<WG615> the prophets<WG4396>, and<WG2532> stoneth<WG3036> them that are sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> her<WG846>! how often<WG4212> would I have<WG2309> gathered<WG1996> thy<WG4675> children<WG5043> together<WG1996>, even<WG3739> as<WG5158> a hen<WG3733> gathereth<WG1996> her<WG1438> chickens<WG3556> under<WG5259> her wings<WG4420>, and<WG2532> ye would<WG2309> not<WG3756>!
Behold <WG2400>, your<WG5216> house<WG3624> is left<WG863> unto you<WG5213> desolate<WG2048>.

For <WG1063> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, Ye shall<WG1492> not<WG3756> see<WG1492> me<WG3165> henceforth<WG737>, till<WG2193> ye<WG302> shall say<WG2036>, Blessed<WG2127> is he that cometh<WG2064> in<WG1722> the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962>.
